search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Nutshell (nutshell-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Nutshell CRM can be found here: [https://www.nutshell.com/pricing](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
Nutshell CRM Pricing: Affordable Plans With Powerful Features
===============
                                                                                           

![Image 31](https://www.nutshell.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/nutshell-mark-icon.png)

*   [CRM Features](https://www.nutshell.com/features)
    *   [Featured](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing#)
        
        The foundational features for any growing business.
        
        *   *   [![Image 46: sync-3-logos](blob:http://localhost/235b0e186995406bbd8be4a5bfc48493)Email & Calendar Sync](https://www.nutshell.com/features/email-calendar-sync)
                
                Create a hub for all your communications and meetings.
                
            *   [Team Collaboration](https://www.nutshell.com/features/team-collaboration)
                
                Store customer notes & interactions for anyone to view.
                
            *   [Sales Automation](https://www.nutshell.com/features/sales-automation)
                
                Put time-wasting tasks on autopilot for max efficiency.
                
            *   [Pipeline Management](https://www.nutshell.com/features/pipeline-management)
                
                Custom pipeline views that make it easy for your reps.
                
            *   [![Image 48: marketing](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Marketing Automation](https://www.nutshell.com/features/email)
                
                Create email lists, drip series, & funnel-based emails.
                
            *   [![Image 50: security-1](blob:http://localhost/0dea137e36928fabec5ca72b4c7d8973)Security](https://www.nutshell.com/security)
                
                Safely and reliably store important information.
                
            *   [![Image 52: support (1)](blob:http://localhost/0dea137e36928fabec5ca72b4c7d8973)Customer Support](https://www.nutshell.com/customer-support)
                
                Connect with team to get fast, friendly, and free support.
                
            *   [![Image 54: icon-ai-v2](blob:http://localhost/eecc4a5e7e4943ce9aee2b8fcf707a4c)Artificial Intelligence](https://www.nutshell.com/features/artificial-intelligence)
                
                Streamline daily processes using the power of AI.
                
            *   [![Image 56: security-1](blob:http://localhost/0dea137e36928fabec5ca72b4c7d8973)App Marketplace](https://www.nutshell.com/features/appconnect)
                
                Integrate Nutshell with the rest of your tech stack.
                
            *   [Reporting & Analytics](https://www.nutshell.com/features/reporting-performance-tracking)
                
                Track, view & forecast sales performance.
                
            *   [View All Features](https://www.nutshell.com/features)

        Sales software for any stage of business and any budget.
        
        *   *   [Sales Automation](https://www.nutshell.com/features/sales-automation)

            *   [Pipeline Management](https://www.nutshell.com/features/pipeline-management)

            *   [Contact Management](https://www.nutshell.com/features/contact-management)

            *   [Email Automation](https://www.nutshell.com/features/email)
                
                Create email lists, drip series, & funnel-based emails.
                
            *   [Reporting & Analytics](https://www.nutshell.com/features/reporting-performance-tracking)
                
                Track, view & forecast sales performance.
                
            *   [![Image 58: calendar](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Meeting Scheduler](https://www.nutshell.com/features/meeting-scheduler)
                
                Create and manage virtual meetings.
                
            *   [![Image 60: sales-icon-32-x-32](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Quotes](https://www.nutshell.com/quotes)
                
                Create, send and track the progress of quotes/proposals directly in Nutshell.
                
            *   [![Image 62: magnet](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Sales Prospecting](https://www.nutshell.com/features/prospectoriq)
                
                Search through over 200 million contacts, add ideal customers to your CRM.
                
            *   [![Image 64: funnel](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Lead Attribution](https://www.nutshell.com/features/lead-attribution)
                
                Automatically add a channel and source data to new leads.
                
            *   [![Image 66: team](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Contact Enrichment](https://www.nutshell.com/features/peopleiq)
                
                Locate specific individuals working at the companies in your book of business.
                
            *   [![Image 68: audience](blob:http://localhost/0dea137e36928fabec5ca72b4c7d8973)Visitor Identification](https://www.nutshell.com/features/visitoriq)
                
                Pinpoint the companies and individuals visiting your site.
                
            *   [View All Sales Features](https://www.nutshell.com/features/sales)
        
    *   [Marketing](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing#)
        
        Marketing software to help you connect with and convert your audiences.
        
        *   *   [![Image 70: marketing](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Email Marketing](https://www.nutshell.com/features/email-marketing)

            *   [![Image 72: sms](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)SMS Marketing](https://www.nutshell.com/features/sms-marketing)
                
                Send SMS drip campaigns or broadcasts to your audiences.
                
            *   [Email Automation](https://www.nutshell.com/features/email)
                
                Create email lists, drip series, & funnel-based emails.
                
            *   [Web Form Collection](https://www.nutshell.com/features/forms)

            *   [![Image 74: landing-pages](blob:http://localhost/0dea137e36928fabec5ca72b4c7d8973)Landing Pages](https://www.nutshell.com/features/landing-pages)
                
                Create high-converting landing pages with ease.
                
            *   [Analytics & Reporting](https://www.nutshell.com/features/reporting-performance-tracking)
                
                Track, view & forecast sales performance.
                
            *   [![Image 76: audience](blob:http://localhost/0dea137e36928fabec5ca72b4c7d8973)Visitor Identification](https://www.nutshell.com/features/visitoriq)
                
                Pinpoint the companies and individuals visiting your site.
                
            *   [View All Marketing Features](https://www.nutshell.com/features/marketing)
        
    *   [Engagement](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing#)

        *   *   [![Image 78: chat](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)Web Chat](https://www.nutshell.com/features/web-chat)

            *   [![Image 80: sms](blob:http://localhost/e07dc24d843eb4293cb8354eaacf770e)1:1 SMS](https://www.nutshell.com/features/sms)
                
                Send and receive SMS messages from leads and customers directly from Nutshell.
                
            *   [View All Engagement Features](https://www.nutshell.com/features/engagement)
        
*   [Pricing](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing)
    
    *   *   [![Image 82: nutshell-sales-suite-pill-logo](blob:http://localhost/fa210d5eb10759dd9de2d0d29552735b)Sales Suite](https://www.nutshell.com/crm)

Enterprise Power, Small Business Simplicity
===========================================

*   Sales & CRM software for any stage of business
*   Powerful Email Marketing & Landing Page software for your Marketing Team
*   SMS directly in your CRM
*   Integrations to keep you and your team efficient
*   Easy to use. Easy to sell. **That’s Nutshell**.

Choose your Sales Suite plan

Nutshell Sales is our flagship product featuring a robust CRM. Higher tiers include additional features like personal email sequences and scheduling software to help your business close more deals. All Sales plans include free access to [Marketing Foundation](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing#marketing) and [Engagement Foundation](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing#engagement-suite).

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

*   ### Is there a limit to the number of contacts that I can add to Nutshell?
    
    Nope! Nutshell comes standard with unlimited CRM contacts and no data limits. Email marketing subscriptions require an additional monthly charge based on your number of marketable contacts. Foundation does have a limit of 100 open leads.
    
*   ### How can I import my contacts into Nutshell?
    
    Getting your people into Nutshell from any source is simple—just put your contacts into a CSV file, select the appropriate Nutshell fields, and import away! We have a [helpful video](https://support.nutshell.com/en/articles/8429106-import-how-to-import-your-contacts-to-nutshell) that walks through the process, or you can [reach out to our support team](https://www.nutshell.com/contact) for assistance.
    
*   ### So what’s a “marketing contact”?
    
    Great question! A **marketing contact** is a person in Nutshell that has at least one email address and hasn’t unsubscribed from your communications or bounced from previous outreach.
    
*   ### Will I need IT to implement Nutshell?
    
    Only if you spill your coffee on your keyboard. Nutshell is an out-of-the-box, cloud-based tool, so there’s no need to get the techies involved. And that means you can use it from anywhere, too.
    
*   ### Does Nutshell work on my mobile phone or tablet?
    
    You bet it does. If you have an iPhone or Android phone, we offer apps that you can download for free in the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nutshell-small-business-crm/id337938121) or [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nutshell.crm&hl=en).
    
    If you use a tablet (like an iPad or Surface), Nutshell is responsively designed to work smoothly from your browser.
    
*   ### Does Nutshell work with my email?
    
    Yep. Nutshell works with all email providers and clients, including Google and Outlook. You’ll never have to worry about your email not syncing with Nutshell.
    
*   ### What do I do if I need help?
    
    [Just contact us!](https://www.nutshell.com/contact) We’ve got you covered. We think that every single user—whether you’re just getting started with your trial or you’re a longtime customer—deserves helpful support.
    
*   ### Why isn’t there an annual payment option for Email marketing?
    
    It’s hard to predict how many marketing contacts a growing business will gain over the course of a year. Instead of asking our customers to predict how many contacts they _think_ they’ll need during an annual subscription, we think it’s easier to charge Email marketing users month-to-month, so you can increase your contact limit as needed.
    
*   ### I’m not paying for Email marketing, and yet I seem to have access to it in my Nutshell account. What’s going on here?
    
    Don’t worry, we’re just giving you a little taste on the house. Nutshell customers can still send 150 delivered marketing emails per month (including test messages), even without a paid subscription.
    
    With a paid Nutshell email marketing subscription, your team has a monthly send limit equal to 8X your contact limit.
    

[Load More](https://www.nutshell.com/pricing#)
